stories.text:
Every day on this website, I read at least once someone claiming that natural immunity is less effective than vaccine immunity at protecting against COVID-19.

This is false in terms of what we know to be true about the immune system, and demonstrably-so with dozens of reputable studies on the matter to back up how absurd that claim is.

If the community of HN itself will not police these matters, that speaks very poorly of this community, since as engineers and scientists ourselves, we ought to know better. It also speaks poorly to the moderation of HN, since it means the moderators here do not care that the members of their industry are making themselves look so foolish to the rest of the internet.
stories.title: Why does HN allow the posting of medical misinformation?
